reviewText: I 1st saw this in the theatre/cinema as a schoolboy.  My chum and I thought that we were going to see a 'War Movie.'  It certainly was more than that.  Richard Attenborough's directorial debut is a film version of the tremendously successful West End Musical compilation of World War I songs.  Very high production values, and very strange.  Sadly it's 'only' a DVD, because there is - currently - no Blue Ray version available.
a good print of this sublime musical.
